General.Name: China Datang Corporation Renewable Power Co. Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: China Datang Corporation Renewable Power Co., Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, investment, construction, and management of wind, solar, hydro, and biomass power sources the People's Republic of China. It is also involved in the research and development, application, and promotion of low carbon technology; research, sale, testing, and maintenance of renewable energy-related equipment; power generation; and design, construction and installation, repair, and maintenance of power projects. In addition, the company provides import and export services for renewable energy equipment and technologies; foreign investments; and renewable energy-related consulting services. As of December 31, 2022, it had consolidated installed capacity of 14,193.37 megawatts (MW), including 12,687.90 MW of wind power installed capacity and 1,500.47 MW of photovoltaic installed capacity. The company was formerly known as Datang Chifeng Saihanba Wind Power Generation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Datang Corporation Renewable Power Co., Limited in March 2009. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. China Datang Corporation Renewable Power Co., Limited is a subsidiary of Datang Corporation.
